name: Plicplic
description:
- "Plicplic is one of the more unique and entertaining experiences you can get" - Toucharcade.com
- “PlicPlic is a really good game” - 148apps.com
- “centered around a game mechanic that I haven’t seen used previously...creating a unique experience” - Toucharcade.com
- "The excellent PlicPlic" - applicationiphone.com
- “Plicplic has a huge potential” - PocketGamer.fr

Let's fly!
Help get PlicPlic, the little umbrella, high enough to discover space and try for a new highscore!
Rush to the stars, slalom through the storms, and avoid the birds!

Priority to fun. With a simple and original game mechanic, discover a new way of playing: you won't get enough of surfing the wind!

Main features:
- Gorgeous graphics.
- Innovative and super fun gameplay.
- More than 50 objectives to multiply your score.
- Collect coins and use them to unlock upgrades and beat your score.


Follow PlicPlic:
